name: Knight Ab-errant
description: A large, humanoid creature dressed in armor scraps, showcasing a blend of strength and tactics in combat.
memorable: Its ability to deal extra damage to smaller foes and resistance to magic makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: To dominate opponents in melee combat and withstand magical attacks.
relations: May be encountered alongside other combat-oriented humanoids or serve as a champion for a dark force.
environment: Found in various combat scenarios or battlefields.
strengths: Excels in melee combat with strong attacks and advantages against magic effects.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to psychic damage, which can be particularly damaging to it.
attacks: The Knight Ab-errant makes powerful melee attacks, including a sweeping maul that can knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Bigger They Are allows it to deal additional damage to smaller creatures, enhancing its offensive capabilities.
skills: Proficient in athletics and intimidation, allowing it to exert physical dominance and instill fear.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
The Reckless ability allows for aggressive attacks at the cost of increased danger from foes.
Possesses the Harder They Fall ability, introducing risk with critical hits.
Has decent Constitution, providing durable health in combat.
test_queries: combat-focused creature that knocks foes prone
formidable melee fighter in armor scraps
tactical humanoid that excels in close combat
